verses.t: Forasmuch then as{G3767} Christ{G5547} hath suffered{G3958} for{G5228} us{G2257} in the flesh{G4561}, arm{G3695} yourselves{G5210} likewise{G2532} with the same{G846} mind{G1771}: for{G3754} he that hath suffered{G3958} in{G1722} the flesh{G4561} hath ceased{G3973} from sin{G266};

That{G1519} he{G980} no longer{G3371} should live{G980} the rest{G1954} of{G5550} his time{G5550} in{G1722} the flesh{G4561} to the lusts{G1939} of men{G444}, but{G235} to the will{G2307} of God{G2316}.

For{G1063} the time{G5550} past{G3928} of{G3588} our life{G979} may suffice{G713} us{G2254} to have wrought{G2716} the will{G3588} of the Gentiles{G3588}, when we walked{G4198} in{G1722} lasciviousness{G766}, lusts{G1939}, excess of wine{G3632}, revellings{G2970}, banquetings{G4224}, and{G2532} abominable{G111} idolatries{G1495}:
Wherein{G1722} they think it strange{G3579} that ye{G5216} run{G4936} not{G3361} with{G1519} them to{G1519} the same{G846} excess{G401} of riot{G3588}, speaking evil of{G987} you:
Who{G3739} shall give{G591} account{G3056} to him that is{G2192} ready{G2093} to judge{G2919} the quick{G2198} and{G2532} the dead{G3498}.

For{G1063} for{G1519} this cause{G5124} was the gospel preached{G2097} also{G2532} to them that are dead{G3498}, that{G2443} they might be judged{G2919} according to{G2596} men{G444} in the flesh{G4561}, but{G1161} live{G2198} according to{G2596} God{G2316} in the spirit{G4151}.Men is not translated. Not sure what to do with tag.
But{G1161} the end{G3588} of all things{G3956} is at hand{G1448}: be ye{G4993} therefore{G3767} sober{G4993}, and{G2532} watch{G3525} unto{G1519} prayer{G3588}.
And{G1161} above{G4253} all things{G3956} have{G2192} fervent{G1618} charity{G26} among{G1519} yourselves{G1438}: for{G3754} charity{G3588} shall cover{G2572} the multitude{G4128} of sins{G266}.
Use hospitality{G5382} one{G240} to{G1519} another{G240} without{G427} grudging{G1112}.

As{G2531} every man{G1538} hath received{G2983} the gift{G5486}, even so minister{G1247} the same{G846} one{G1438} to{G1519} another{G1438}, as{G5613} good{G2570} stewards{G3623} of the manifold{G4164} grace{G5485} of God{G2316}.

If{G1487} any man{G5100} speak{G2980}, let him speak as{G5613} the oracles{G3051} of God{G2316}; if{G1487} any man{G5100} minister{G1247}, let him do it as{G5613} of{G1537} the ability{G2479} which{G3739} God{G3588} giveth{G5524}: that{G2443} God{G3588} in{G1722} all things{G3956} may be glorified{G1392} through{G1223} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, to whom{G3739} be{G2076} praise{G3588} and{G2532} dominion{G3588} for{G1519} ever{G3588} and ever{G3588}. Amen{G281}.

Beloved{G27}, think it{G3579} not{G3361} strange{G3579} concerning{G1722} the fiery trial{G4451} which is{G1096} to{G4314}try{G3986} you{G5213}, as though{G5613} some strange thing{G3581} happened{G4819} unto you{G5213}:"Concerning" translates en umin. Not sure about tag placement.

But{G235} rejoice{G5463}, inasmuch as{G2526} ye are partakers{G2841} of Christ's{G3588} sufferings{G3804}; that{G2443}, when{G1722} his{G846} glory{G3588} shall be revealed{G3588}, ye may be glad{G5463} also{G2532} with exceeding joy{G21}.

If{G1487} ye be reproached{G3679} for{G1722} the name{G3686} of Christ{G5547}, happy{G3107} are ye; for{G3754} the spirit{G4151} of glory{G3588} and{G2532} of God{G3588} resteth{G373} upon{G1909} you{G5209}: on{G2596} their{G846} part{G2596} he is evil spoken of{G987}, but{G1161} on{G2596} your{G5209} part{G2596} he is glorified{G1392}.

But{G1063} let{G3958} none{G3361} of you{G5216} suffer{G3958} as{G5613} a murderer{G5406}, or{G2228} as a thief{G2812}, or{G2228} as an evildoer{G2555}, or{G2228} as{G5613} a busybody in other men's matters{G244}.Unsure of placement of tis. "None" translates mhâ€¦tis.
Yet{G1161} if{G1487} any man suffer as{G5613} a Christian{G5546}, let him{G153} not{G3361} be ashamed{G153}; but{G1161} let him glorify{G1392} God{G3588} on{G1722} this{G5129} behalf{G3588}.

For{G3754} the time{G3588} is come that judgment{G3588} must begin{G756} at{G575} the house{G3588} of God{G3588}: and{G1161} if{G1487} it first{G4412} begin at{G575} us{G2257}, what{G5101} shall the end{G3588} be of them that obey not{G544} the gospel{G2098} of God{G3588}?
And{G2532} if{G1487} the righteous{G1342} scarcely{G3433} be saved{G4982}, where{G4226} shall{G5316} the ungodly{G765} and{G2532} the sinner{G268} appear{G5316}?

Wherefore{G5620} let them that suffer{G3958} according to{G2596} the will{G3588} of God{G3588} commit the keeping{G3908} of their{G1438} souls{G3588} to him in{G1722} well doing{G16}, as{G5613} unto a faithful{G4103} Creator{G2939}.Unsure of placement of tag for kai.
